description: Tyler Riggz, Cal Skye, Sean Preston. Coach Riggz informs Cal and Sean how lucky they are to make the varsity team. Still he questions their dedication and proposes they show him which one is more willing to prove their worth. At first reluctant, the two quickly show their mettle and service their coach, sucking his dick and licking his manhole. Coach Riggz is one demanding son-of-a-bitch, but the young men obey his every command. Persuaded to kiss, fondle and suck each other's cock, then fuck and get fucked, they show their leader that they are indeed team players, and more than willing to go that extra mile.
title: Rough Play, Scene #02
